SRP.A: Corporate Campuses is positioned {outside} Short-Term Rentals.

NC.Q: Which has the largest value: Commercial Real Estate, Rental Market, Office Buildings, or Single Family Homes?
NC.A: The value of {Commercial Real Estate} is the largest.

NC.Q: Which is larger, the value of Commercial Real Estate or Rental Market?
NC.A: The value of {Commercial Real Estate} is larger.

NC.Q: Which is smaller, the value of Rental Market, Office Buildings, or Residential Property?
NC.A: The value of {Residential Property} is smaller.

MSR.Q: Which hierarchical path in the sunburst chart makes the largest contribution to the total?
MSR.A: The path that contributes the most to the total is: {Commercial Real Estate to Office Buildings to Suburban Offices to Corporate Campuses}.
